title: The Venetian Resort
route: Enter a world made in the image of Italian-inspired grandeur, where possibility waits around every corner. You're invited to explore dynamic experiences in opulent surroundings, from lavish suites and electrifying casinos to world-class restaurants and entertainment. Here's to la bella vita.

title: MGM Grand
route: Freehand Los Angeles blends boutique style with hostel vibes in downtown LA. Set in a restored 1920s building, it offers chic private rooms, shared dorms, and a rooftop pool with sweeping city views. Popular for its artsy design, lively Broken Shaker bar, and central location near entertainment and dining.

title: Caesars Palace
route: PodShare Hollywood is a budget-friendly co-living space in the heart of Hollywood, Los Angeles. It offers shared sleeping pods, communal kitchens, and lounge areas, creating a social and vibrant environment. Ideal for solo travelers, digital nomads, or groups seeking affordable accommodations near major attractions like the Walk of Fame.

title: Mariott International
route: The LINE Hotel Los Angeles, located in vibrant Koreatown, offers a stylish and modern boutique experience ideal for couples. With chic rooms, rooftop pool, and trendy dining, it blends romance and city energy. Perfect for couples seeking a lively, design-focused stay while exploring LA’s restaurants, nightlife, and attractions.

title: Hilton Hotel and Resorts
route: The LINE Hotel Los Angeles, located in vibrant Koreatown, offers a stylish and modern boutique experience ideal for couples.
